from math import sqrt
r = int(input())
cnt=0
rt=[]
for i in range(1,16*r):
 for j in range(i, 460):
  for k in range(j+1, j+i):
   #print i,j,k
   s = float((i+j+k))/2
   #print s,i,j,k,s*(s-i)*(s-j)*(s-k)
   area = sqrt(abs(s*(s-i)*(s-j)*(s-k)))
   #print(float(2*area))/(i+j+k)
   if (r==(float(2*area))/(i+j+k)):
    cnt+=1
    #print i,j,k,area
    rt.append([i,j,k])
    
print(cnt)

for i in rt:
 for j in i:
  print(j, end=' ')
 print()

from math import sqrt
r = int(input())
cnt=0
rt=[]
for i in range(1,10*r):
 for j in range(i, 150):
  for k in range(j+1, j+i):
   #print i,j,k
   s = float((i+j+k))/2
   #print s,i,j,k,s*(s-i)*(s-j)*(s-k)
   area = sqrt(abs(s*(s-i)*(s-j)*(s-k)))
   #print(float(2*area))/(i+j+k)
   if (r==(float(2*area))/(i+j+k)):
    cnt+=1
    #print i,j,k,area
    rt.append([i,j,k])
    
print(cnt)

for i in rt:
 for j in i:
  print(j, end=' ')
 print()
